Enterprise Cloud and Infrastructure Automation

This module will look at the usage of Cloud Computing and Amazon Web Services (AWS) or other suitable cloud solutions as a base for the practical work. In addition, we will be looking in detail at virtual hardware using VMWare in the modules. Within this module, you will look at the usage case of the different aspects of this technology and get to understand the impact of decisions that are made.

Learning Objectives:

+   Research and evaluate different automation techniques used within different organisations.

+   Investigate and critically evaluate how automation can be used to enhance an organisation's infrastructure.

+   Implement a cloud-based infrastructure for a given scenario which will aid an sme to improve its business performance and meet regulatory requirements.

+   Critically evaluate new approaches in automated services and evaluate the benefits and the risks for within a commercial environment.
